FuncDef:
The frame-format command sets the frame format of a CPOS interface.
The undo frame-format command restores the default setting.
By default, SDH is used.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the Synchronous Optical Network (SONET) format.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
SDH and SONET are different standards defined by different organizations, but their content and functions are similar. SDH and SONET are used in different areas and are allocated different default values by different vendors. Ensure that the configured frame format is the same as that on the transmission device.
Precautions
frame-format sonet only supports on CR53-P10-2xcPOS/STM1-SFP subCard.
